snippet: The teams became the first to reach the second round of the Champions League, with Madrid beating Paris St.-Germain and City winning at Sevilla.
abstract: Real Madrid defeats Paris St-Germain, 1-0, and Manchester City beats Sevilla, 3-1, to reach Champions League second round; other soccer matches and news noted.
lead_paragraph: The teams became the first to reach the second round of the Champions League, with Madrid beating Paris St.-Germain and City winning at Sevilla.

headline.main: Real Madrid and Manchester City Advance
